Folsom.KZZO:
KZZO (100.5 FM) is an Hot AC radio station in Sacramento, California, known as Now 100 FM. KZZO's transmitter is located in Folsom. It is owned by CBS Radio with studios on Commerce Circle in Sacramento near the American River and the North Sacramento Freeway (Route 160).
KZZO operates at 115,000 watts effective radiated power as one of the most powerful FM radio stations in Northern California, while most FM stations in the region operate at 50,000 watts.
